title: Since Hextech Crafting is out now on NA, is there an ETA on when we'll get it?
body: I want to start getting the sweet loots. I went over to my alt account on NA and got the cutest ward skin, so I'm super excited for it

replies.body:
Within the next couple of weeks!

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/hextech-crafting-now-live-na
Damn that sucks we have to still wait a few weeks :(
